title: QFN Solder Paste Example (Exposed Pad)
summary: Stencil/solder paste land pattern example for the exposed-pad package with segmented center pad openings and perimeter pads.

structured_data.description: Drawing includes 24 perimeter pads, segmented exposed-pad paste windows, symmetry references, and notes indicating 78% printed coverage based on 0.125 mm stencil thickness (scale 20X).
